page.title: 02THE NORMAN CONQUEST.
page.content: The Normans were fighting for land and conquest-the English were defending their homeland,and both armies fought fiercely throughout a dreadful day.Once the Normans thought William was wounded and had left the battle field but he raised the visor of his helmet and shouted "Look,I am unharmed".Towards evening William ordered a great volley of arrows to fall on Harold ,one of the arrows pierced King Harold's eye and Norman sword thrusts killed him.At this point the heart went out of the English and they yielded to William.William buried Harold's body on the sea-shore and wrote on a stone "You rest here a king,Harold,that you may be guardian still of the shore and sea."
